content: 2013 Singaporean film ***Love ... and Other Bad Habits*** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 玩味爱情) is a 2013 Singaporean romantic drama film directed by [Lee Thean-jeen](/wiki/Lee_Thean-jeen). It is Singapore’s first telemovie to be shown in cinemas and the first local theatrically released film to have an alternative ending screened at different locations. Distributed by [Cathay-Keris Films](/wiki/Cathay-Keris_Films), the film stars [Zoe Tay](/wiki/Zoe_Tay), [Chen Hanwei](/wiki/Chen_Hanwei), [George Young](/wiki/George_Young_(actor)), [Carmen Soo](/wiki/Carmen_Soo), [Ian Fang](/wiki/Ian_Fang), [Kimberly Chia](/wiki/Kimberly_Chia) and [Kym Ng](/wiki/Kym_Ng). ## Cast - [Zoe Tay](/wiki/Zoe_Tay) as Mei - [Chen Hanwei](/wiki/Chen_Hanwei) as Chin Wei - [George Young](/wiki/George_Young_(actor)) as Mike - [Carmen Soo](/wiki/Carmen_Soo) as Jess - [Ian Fang](/wiki/Ian_Fang) as Darrell - [Kimberly Chia](/wiki/Kimberly_Chia) as Ann - [Kym Ng](/wiki/Kym_Ng) as Suzy - [Irene Ang](/wiki/Irene_Ang) as Mrs Cheng Cheng - Tan Shou Chen as JJ - Malèna Tornatore as May - Andrew Lua as Damian - Sivakumar Palakrishnan as Mr. Rosario - Henry Heng as Mr. Hee - [Fang Rong](/wiki/Fang_Rong_(actress)) as Nikki - Gillian Tan as Leona - Leron Heng as Emily - Elias Tiong as Kiat - Gabriel Lee as Xavier - Ashley Leong as Jonathan ## Release First released as a telemovie on streaming site [Toggle](/wiki/Toggle_(website)), the film had its theatrical release on 14 February 2013, with version A ending shown at Cineleisure Orchard, Causeway Point, Downtown East and version B ending screened at AMK Hub and West Mall [Cathay Cineplexes](/wiki/Cathay_Cineplexes). - *Love... and Other Bad Habits* at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) This article related to a Singaporean film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This 2010s drama film–related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
title: Love ... and Other Bad Habits
